sentences.en: A grove of trees shadowed the house densely.
sentences.cn: 树丛把这幢房子遮蔽得很密实.

sentences.en: Below was a plum tree grove with branches in full flower.
sentences.cn: 这是一片梅林,红白两种梅花开得正繁.

sentences.en: Beyond the orange grove lay - the green ribboned fields of a baronial estate.
sentences.cn: 在柑橘林的那边,展现着一片男爵庄园的带状田野.

sentences.en: I used to take a walk in the quiet grove.
sentences.cn: 过去我常在那安静的小树林里散步.

sentences.en: In high spirits, the group entered a grove of pines.
sentences.cn: 众人又带说带笑地前进了.他们后来走进了松林,周围突然阴暗起来.

sentences.en: On top of the hill was a grove of tall trees.
sentences.cn: 山顶上一片高大的树林.

sentences.en: The grove was not very dense , and the sky was bright overhead.
sentences.cn: 人一抬头就可以望见清明的蓝空.

sentences.en: The grove was the last piece of property the family owned.
The scent of lemons filled the grove.
sentences.cn: 柠檬香味充满了小树林.

sentences.en: The statue was erected in a damp grove at Olympia.
sentences.cn: 雕像建造在奥林匹亚潮湿的小树林中.

sentences.en: The sunlit grove was like something out of Grimm.
sentences.cn: 这个洒满阳光的小树林,简直和《格林童话》里的仙境一般.

sentences.en: There. s an astonishing amount of life in old Grove .
sentences.cn: 老 格鲁夫 还真有精神.

sentences.en: They clambered up the stone walls of a steeply terraced olive grove.
sentences.cn: 他们手脚并用，爬上了一片成陡直梯田状的橄榄林外面的石头围墙。

sentences.en: We had made arrangements to stop by her house in Pacific Grove.
sentences.cn: 我们已安排好去造访她位于帕西菲克格罗夫的家。

trans.tran_en: a piece of land with trees growing on it
